data.title: Sanaya Irani and Mohit Sehgal's official wedding album is here and it's everybit dreamy
data.meta_description: Sanaya Irani and Mohit Sehgal's official wedding album is here and it's everybit dreamy - view pics - Sanaya Irani and Mohit Sehgal got married on 25th January this year
data.text:
Sanaya Irani always wanted her wedding to be a party and a very intimate affair. Her dream came true on January 25th this year as she got hitched to long-time beau, Mohit Sehgal on the sandy beaches of South Goa in the company of their close friends and family. The lovely actress looked radiant in a beige lehenga with a red veil. Mohit Sehgal opted for a plain golden-brown sherwani, which he off-setted with a bright blue sehra. Eversince the news of their wedding broke, their fans have been eagerly waiting to see the pictures. And now the wait is finally over. Here's their official wedding album.

Mohitâ€™s pals Arjun Bijlani, Raqesh Vashishth and Barun Sobti can be seen in the pictures. Sanaya's girls Neha Swami, Riddhi Dogra and Drashti Dhami can also be spotted in the pictures having a gala time. Take a look -
